mapper.insert: insert into reply (user_no, review_no, reply_content, create_date) values (#{userNo}, #{reviewNo}, #{replyContent}, #{createDate})
mapper.update: update reply set reply_content = #{replyContent} where reply_no = #{replyNo} and user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.delete: delete from reply where reply_no = #{replyNo} and user_no = #{userNo}
